head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COPLON, NANCY, ZEILER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COPLON, NANCY, ZEILER

block.p: COPLON--Nancy, Zeiler. January 11th, 2007. Beloved mother of Benjamin and Jonathan, loving daughter of Norman and Miriam Zeiler. Her strength and spirit will be deeply missed and never forgotten. Memorial Service Monday January 15, 11:30am at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81st St. In lieu of flowers, donations should be made to the MS Society.

COPLON--Nancy, Zeiler. January 11th, 2007. Beloved mother of Benjamin and Jonathan, loving daughter of Norman and Miriam Zeiler. Her strength and spirit will be deeply missed and never forgotten. Memorial Service Monday January 15, 11:30am at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81st St. In lieu of flowers, donations should be made to the MS Society.
